entry.title: Adventures In Dublin
entry.summary: Things for Jason and Zoe to do on Saturday!

entry.title: Apples
entry.content:
An apple is a sweet, edible fruit produced by an apple tree.

Apple trees are cultivated worldwide, and are the most widely grown species in the genus Malus. The tree originated in Central Asia, where its wild ancestor, Malus sieversii, is still found today. Apples have been grown for thousands of years in Asia and Europe, and were brought to North America by European colonists.
entry.summary: An apple is a sweet, edible fruit produced by an apple tree.

entry.title: Bananas
entry.content:
A banana is an edible fruit – botanically a berry – produced by several kinds of large herbaceous flowering plants in the genus Musa.

In some countries, bananas used for cooking may be called “plantains”, distinguishing them from dessert bananas. The fruit is variable in size, color, and firmness, but is usually elongated and curved, with soft flesh rich in starch covered with a rind, which may be green, yellow, red, purple, or brown when ripe.
entry.summary: A banana is an edible fruit – botanically a berry – produced by several kinds of large herbaceous flowering plants in the genus Musa.

entry.title: Kia Ora, I’m Jason Crabtree
entry.content:
I solve problems for people and businesses. I do that thoughtfully, creatively and pragmatically. Recently I’ve spent my days working in Customer Experience Design focused on cross-channel service design. At night, I’m learning to digital product design.

After five years working for New Zealand’s largest insurance company, I’ve changed industries and continents. On January 29, 2019 I packed my life into a suitcase and moved to Dublin, Ireland.

I’m now on the hunt for new opportunities. My focus is working with a business-business software (SaaS) company solving meaningful problems for people and businesses. I believe helping people at work is a huge leverage point for helping to improve people’s lives.

I’m a team player, empathetic and good under pressure. I get stuff done and I’m a quick learner with knowledge in lots of different areas. I’d love to learn more about how we can work together — and how I can help you and your business.
entry.summary: I solve problems for people and businesses. I do that thoughtfully, creatively and pragmatically. Recently I’ve spent my days working in Customer Experience Design focused on cross-channel service design. At night, I’m learning to digital product design.

entry.title: Loving Kiwifruit
entry.content:
Kiwifruit (often abbreviated as kiwi), or Chinese gooseberry is the edible berry of several species of woody vines in the genus Actinidia.

The most common cultivar group of kiwifruit is oval, about the size of a large hen’s egg (5–8 cm (2.0–3.1 in) in length and 4.5–5.5 cm (1.8–2.2 in) in diameter).

It has a fibrous, dull greenish-brown skin and bright green or golden flesh with rows of tiny, black, edible seeds. The fruit has a soft texture, with a sweet and unique flavor.

This will be styled as a p tag with the css class fake-2
